item.title: Can you make this code work for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“Rune Classic, post:1, topic:329519”]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(717, 1);
talk(“Wake up!”, 1);
OptionText: Ok
OptionText; Nah Im tired
If PlayerHandler; Right = Ok; Return GFX = 22.
If PlayerHandler; Right = Nah; Return GFX = 191;[/quote]
Where are the public voids?

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make this code work for Delta?

item.title: Can you make this code work for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

guitardom:

probebly just put it in playerhandler.java and compile

What?

It might just be me, but it looks the code you posted came from the land of faerytales and unicorns.
However, it can be made to work with Delta, but I’m not going to spoonfeed you here.
Try searching how starter commands work, and how dialogues work. Combine these two, and you have the effect you want.

Read full topic
